main event: A series of UFO sightings were reported over the Midwest and Southwest U.S. between July 23 and July 26, 1961, involving multiple witnesses and descriptions of various objects.
interesting points: One witness described seeing a small high-speed white object trailing with a reflection,Attempts were made to identify the object as either a meteor or an exceptionally bright star,Multiple aircraft reported sightings of a light resembling a comet,The sightings occurred during the night and were mostly visual observations from aircraft and ground observers,There were no photographs taken during the sightings.
sighted object: bright new comet and small high-speed white objects
witness description: Airline pilots and ground observers with excellent reliability ratings.
